description.displayText:
Resa has been our nanny for the last 15 months, taking care of our two and four year olds 40 hours/wk.

Resa manages everything from the kids meals to educational activities to outdoor time. She is their best friend and teacher, and is incredibly patient. She's always punctual and reliable. We started off not knowing how long we'd have a nanny because of the pandemic and loved Resa so much have kept her until now when my oldest starts school. 

My son said "I love her because she plays with me and is nice." She plays Lego, has been teaching P to read and do math, plays make believe, does crafts and science experiments, you name it! Truly a fantastic nanny - if you are searching for someone I would highly recommend contacting Resa!

description.displayText: Resa has been our nanny for the last 13 months and is absolutely amazing! She's taken care of our two and four year olds - playing with them, teaching them, helping them grow into little wonderful people. She's kind, patient, creative and thoughtful. She's my children's best friend and we are going to miss her when P. starts school in August. If you have the opportunity to hire Resa, I would not hesitate!!! Resa is also punctual, happy to help with my dog, prepares the kids meals and activities, and never misses work. She's super reliable and friendly.
